description: Gets the properties associated with a specific endpoint. Use this operation to get the status of an endpoint. For information about endpoints, see Managing endpoints.

parameters.name: EndpointArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the endpoint being described.

nested_items.name: EndpointProperties
nested_items.description: Describes information associated with the specific endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the endpoint. Because the endpoint updates and creation are asynchronous, so customers will need to wait for the endpoint to be Ready status before making inference requests.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Specifies a reason for failure in cases of Failed status.

nested_items.name: ModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the model to which the endpoint is attached.

nested_items.name: DesiredModelArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the new model to use for updating an existing endpoint. This ARN is going to be different from the model ARN when the update is in progress.

nested_items.name: DesiredInferenceUnits
nested_items.description: The desired number of inference units to be used by the model using this endpoint. Each inference unit represents of a throughput of 100 characters per second.

nested_items.name: CurrentInferenceUnits
nested_items.description: The number of inference units currently used by the model using this endpoint.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the endpoint was last modified.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that grants Amazon Comprehend read access to trained custom models encrypted with a customer managed key (ModelKmsKeyId).

nested_items.name: DesiredDataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: Data access role ARN to use in case the new model is encrypted with a customer KMS key.

nested_items.name: FlywheelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flywheel.
